replies.msg:
https://hackernoon.com/javascript-hacks-for-es6-hipsters-67d633ce8ace

想試玩下個cloning of object e.g. test.js
1 const objA = {foo: "foo", bar: "bar", list: () => objA.foo + objB.bar};
2 const objB = {...objA};
3 console.log(objB.list()); // foobar

點知一用babel --presets env test.js -o output.js, 就出咗"unexpected token" error指住Line #2!

Google咗好耐, 終於查到呢個所謂cloning of object其實正式名叫object rest/spread properties, 仲係experimental/Stage 3/ES Next階段, 都仲未係ES standard嚟, 要裝個babel plugin先用得, 跟住打下面句嘢就OK出到"foobar"呢個正常result喇:
> babel --presets env --plugins transform-object-rest-spread test.js -o output.js

除咗object rest/spread properties, 其實仲有好多好多non-ES-Standard features要用babel plugins先行得到, 詳見以下列表:



P.S. 有樣嘢好PK嘅就係: 好多major browsers雖然都仲未adopt得哂所有已經finalized咗嘅ES Standards (i.e. ES5, ES2015, ES2016, ES2017呢啲), 但就已經adopt咗好多non-ES-Standard features(e.g. Chrome and Firefox have already included the object rest/spread feature in their latest stable version!). 班網上寫手見啲latest browsers有新features就急不及待噉post出嚟威, 但又唔warn人有邊啲仲未係ES-Standard features嚟, 好唔professional囉, DKLM!!!

$ node -v
v8.9.1
$ node
> const objA = {foo: "foo", bar: "bar", list: () => objA.foo + objB.bar};
undefined
> const objB = {...objA};
undefined
> console.log(objB.list());
foobar
undefined

順帶一提
呢個Syntax做到嘅Cloning只有First Level
First Level之後都係Reference嚟

$ node
> const objA = {a : {b : 1}, c : {d : 2}}
undefined
> const objB = {...objA}
undefined
> objB.a.b = 3
3
> objA.a.b
3

$ node -v
v8.9.1
$ node
> const objA = {foo: "foo", bar: "bar", list: () => objA.foo + http://objB.bar};
undefined
> const objB = {...objA};
undefined
> console.log(objB.list());
foobar
undefined



typo嚟啫.

順帶一提
呢個Syntax做到嘅Cloning只有First Level
First Level之後都係Reference嚟

$ node
> const objA = {a : {b : 1}, c : {d : 2}}
undefined
> const objB = {...objA}
undefined
> objB.a.b = 3
3
> objA.a.b
3


hackernoon篇嘢都有提到係shallow cloning.

順便介紹大家一個好正嘅online compiler/IDE website: https://www.jdoodle.com/
特色係佢裏面包嘅programming/scripting languages, 都有幾乎係最新嘅version, e.g. NodeJS有9.2.0; Haskell有8.2.1, etc.!




(P.S. 絕大部分online compilers/IDEs都只提供啲好撚舊嘅versions畀人用, 垃撚圾, 呢個JDoodle先叫做似啲樣! )
